title: Rek'Sai and Zephyr
body:
I look at {{champion:421}} , and I look at {{item:3172}} ,and I can't help but think I should build it on her... but I never really go for it... I always seem to go (jungle item+ warrior or devourer) and then hydra, then FM and then either tanky or even more AD if i'm doing well. the MS, the CDR, the AD, the aspd... all glorious on rek... but I just never do it... 

now GD, tell me why I am stupid, and how to build her properly.
